thread.title: Funds Still Struggle to Set Values Amid Computer Woes
thread.title_full: Funds Still Struggle to Set Values Amid Computer Woes - WSJ

author: Kirsten Grind
title: Funds Still Struggle to Set Values Amid Computer Woes
text:
Computer problems plagued the U.S. asset-management industry for a fourth day Thursday, as Bank of New York Mellon Corp. said it was still working to correct a glitch that caused hundreds of mutual and exchange-traded funds to miscalculate the value of fund assets.
The bank said in a statement that the accounting platform it uses to price fund securities, the SunGard InvestOne platform operated by SunGard Data Systems Inc., began to...
